CustomField.description: When a mapping field is updated, this value will get set to true. If a user tries clicks Sync Audience, they will be prompted to sync all historical lead/contact data to Mailchimp.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When a mapping field is updated, this value will get set to true. If a user tries clicks Sync Audience, they will be prompted to sync all historical lead/contact data to Mailchimp.
CustomField.label: Prompt For Full Sync
